body: Thanks, Chris. It seems that if the **[Surface Outside Face Incident Solar Radiation Rate per Area [W/m2]](http://bigladdersoftware.com/epx/docs/8-7/input-output-reference/group-thermal-zone-description-geometry.html#surface-outside-face-incident-solar-radiation-rate-per-area-wm2)** output variable is included in the simulation, **readEPSrfResult** might be able to read it correctly the first time, but once I copy and paste this component there is the warning: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/KKxcsif2Kp0*glQcFvQjrdWiZ0WoQbAeUK3eZwpLlTbPbjxH-r87lGwMv7Dfl2xEZt820UM8zJngK*1OMPCJ8P58dRdAVrGu/Image5.png)
